text: The Złote Kolce () is an annual sports award in recognition of Polish competitors in the sport of athletics. Established in 1970 by Polish newspaper Sport and the Polish Athletic Association, the award is decided by a complex points ranking system, which incorporates scores for performances in major national and international competitions, record-breaking performances, and end-of-year global rankings by the International Association of Athletics Federations. == Winners == {| class="wikitable sortable"
